tasks.label: ðŸ› Debug: Kill + Build + Run
tasks.command: pkill -x 'OpenCode Bar' 2>/dev/null; xcodebuild -project CopilotMonitor/CopilotMonitor.xcodeproj -scheme CopilotMonitor -configuration Debug build && BUILT_PRODUCTS_DIR=$(xcodebuild -project CopilotMonitor/CopilotMonitor.xcodeproj -scheme CopilotMonitor -configuration Debug -showBuildSettings 2>/dev/null | sed -n 's/^[[:space:]]*BUILT_PRODUCTS_DIR = //p' | head -n 1); if [ -z "$BUILT_PRODUCTS_DIR" ]; then echo 'Error: BUILT_PRODUCTS_DIR not found' >&2; exit 1; fi; open "$BUILT_PRODUCTS_DIR/OpenCode Bar.app"
